} else if ((itemUsed == 1513) && (useWith == 590)) { if (playerLevel[11] >= 75) { deleteItem(1513, getItemSlot(1513), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY, 2732, 0, 10); addSkillXP(1200, 11); sM("You attempt to light the logs."); sM("The fire catches and the logs begin to burn."); resetWC(); } else { sM("You need a firemaking level of 75 to burn magic logs."); } }

item.title: Need Help With My Server And Adding Fire and Tinderbox to work
item.dc:creator: @sniper69 sniper69
item.description:
@sniper69 wrote:

Well Not So Much Fie And Tinderbox But I Need To No How To Make One Object use with another and get exp.
I Did this but it doesnt work anywheres and i dont know how to places it and where.
(It would also be helpful if i knew the ids of each skill for example: Firemaking is 11)

else if(itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 995) {
if(playerLevel[15] >= 28) {
deleteItem(590, getItemSlot(590), 1);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 11);
} else {
sendMessage(“Wow! You Burned Money!”);
}
